alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 10:10AM CDT until May 28 at 11:34AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Styx River Near Elsanor affecting Baldwin County. For the Styx River...including Elsanor...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Styx River Near Elsanor. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Water begins to flood Donovan Circle in the Seminole Landing community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 16 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.1 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
